  • Method Details

    • GetAllActors

      public Iterable<Actor> GetAllActors()
      Get all Actors from the repository.
      Returns:
      List of all Actors from ActorRepository.

    • GetActorByID

      public Actor GetActorByID(Integer actorId)
      Find Actor with matching ID.
      Parameters:
      actorId - - ID of Actor to be found.
      Returns:
      Actor with matching ID - or throw NOT_FOUND if no Actors found.

    • GetActorByName

      public Set<Actor> GetActorByName(ActorDTO actorDTO)
      Find Actor with matching name.

      If firstName is null, match with only lastName.
      If lastName is null, match with only firstName.
      Otherwise, match with full name.
      Parameters:
      actorDTO - - Actor Data Transfer Object that holds the firstName and lastName to be searched.
      Returns:
      Set of Actors with matching name(s).

    • AddActor

      public Actor AddActor(ActorDTO actorDTO)
      Add new Actor to the repository.
      Parameters:
      actorDTO - - Actor DTO that holds the new Actor's data.
      Returns:
      The newly created and added Actor.

    • UpdateActor

      public Actor UpdateActor(Integer actorId, ActorDTO actorDTO)
      Update an existing Actor's fields with new data.
      Parameters:
      actorId - - The ID of the Actor to be updated.
      actorDTO - - Holds the new data to insert into the given Actor.
      Returns:
      The updated Actor.

    • DeleteActor

      public Actor DeleteActor(Integer actorId)
      Attempts to delete the Actor with matching ID from the database.

      NOTE: Database constraints will override and prevent the deletion.
      Parameters:
      actorId - - ID of the Actor to be deleted.
      Returns:
      Actor that was attempted to be deleted.

    • UpdateFilmActors

      public void UpdateFilmActors(Integer actorId, Set<Integer> filmIds)
      Updates the FilmActor table to replace all of Actor's old Films with the new Films.
      Parameters:
      actorId - - ID of Actor that was updated.
      filmIds - - List of new Films's IDs associated with the Actor.

      public Iterable<Set<Film>> ActorAllFilms()
